languages.text: "Символ муки — так Темные помечают свои арены, что служат для насыщения их иссохших душ".
"The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."
languages.original_text: "Символ муки — так Темные помечают свои арены, что служат для насыщения их иссохших душ".

traits.locale_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."
"The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

"The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

languages.text: 「トーメントのシンボル…暗黒の者は、こうやってくたびれた魂を癒すのに使える闘技場に目印をつけている」
languages.original_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

traits.locale_text: 「トーメントのシンボル…暗黒の者は、こうやってくたびれた魂を癒すのに使える闘技場に目印をつけている」

languages.text: “是折磨的印记。这是黑暗子嗣刻在竞技场的标记，用来滋养他们枯萎的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

traits.locale_text: “是折磨的印记。这是黑暗子嗣刻在竞技场的标记，用来滋养他们枯萎的灵魂。”

languages.text: « Le symbole du tourment... C'est ainsi que les Eldars noirs marquent les arènes qui leur permettent de nourrir leurs âmes flétries. »
languages.original_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

traits.locale_text: « Le symbole du tourment... C'est ainsi que les Eldars noirs marquent les arènes qui leur permettent de nourrir leurs âmes flétries. »

languages.text: «El símbolo del tormento. Los Oscuros lo usan para marcar las arenas con las que nutren sus almas marchitas».
languages.original_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

traits.locale_text: «El símbolo del tormento. Los Oscuros lo usan para marcar las arenas con las que nutren sus almas marchitas».

languages.text: "Das Symbol der Pein. Damit markieren die Dunklen die Gebiete, die ihre verkümmerten Seelen nähren."
languages.original_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

traits.locale_text: "Das Symbol der Pein. Damit markieren die Dunklen die Gebiete, die ihre verkümmerten Seelen nähren."

languages.text: "Eziyet sembolü. Karalar, solan ruhlarını besleyecek arenaları bu şekilde işaretler."
languages.original_text: "The symbol of torment — this is how the Dark Ones mark the arenas that serve to nourish their withered souls."

traits.locale_text: "Eziyet sembolü. Karalar, solan ruhlarını besleyecek arenaları bu şekilde işaretler."
